MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the TD12 postcode area of Mindrun. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12pm to carry out emergency tree cutting near to Mindrum Farm and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.56am on Wednesday 2nd December 2020.
